content.webTitle: Pick of the Week: Scotland & Ireland: Comedy

fields.headline: Pick of the week: Comedy
fields.bodyText: The Comedy Circuit Arts Guild Theatre, Greenock, Sat 25 Apr; One Touch Theatre, Inverness, Sun 26th Picks of this week's package? Rabble-rousing Australian Jarred Christmas and whimsical Norwegian Daniel Simonsen. Michael Legge The Stand, Glasgow, Wed 29 Apr; The Stand, Edinburgh Thu 30th One of the hidden gems of the live comedy circuit, with eﬀortless rapport and a ﬁrst-class collection of down-to-earth tales. Brian Damage And Krysstal Just Laugh, Stirling, Thu 30 Apr; Just Laugh, Perth, Fri 1 May An irresistible musical duo who provide a mix of enchanting double-act silliness and gloriously crude comedy songs. Rob Brydon: Live 2009 Waterfront Hall, Belfast, Mon 27th Apr Moving away from the character-based comedy that's made him a household name, Brydon's latest tour is a more personal study of being Welsh. Daliso Chaponda Jongleurs Edinburgh, Sat 25 Apr Malawi-born stand-up Chaponda is an expert entertainer, bringing the goods to delight the rowdiest of crowds.
